data_table.description: Anthropometry, Form ANTD, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: ANTD5A
variable.description: [Technician assessment of hair loss]. Participant agrees to participate? Q5a [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD6A
variable.description: [History of hair loss]. Have you ever experienced hair loss or a receding hair line? Q6a [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD6B
variable.description: [History of hair loss]. Approximately at what age did you begin to lose hair? Q6b [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD7
variable.description: [History of hair loss]. Have you ever received or used any treatment for baldness, such as hair implantation or a medication prescribed by a doctor? Q7 [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD8
variable.description: [History of hair loss]. Have you recently received chemotherapy (drug therapy for cancer)? Q8 [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD2
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Weight (to the nearest lb, rounding down). Q2 [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD3A
variable.description: [Body size]. Waist girth (to the nearest cm, rounding down). Q3a [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD3B
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Hip girth (to the nearest cm, rounding down). Q3b [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD5B
variable.description: [Technician assessment of hair loss]. Which figure most closely resembles the participant's hair pattern (from chart)? [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTDFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [1= presence] [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]

variable.name: ANTD1
variable.description: [Height and weight]. Standing height (to the nearest cm, rounding down). Q1 [Anthropometry Form, ANTD, exam 4]
